scripts.debug-android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf 'android/app/src/main/res/drawable-*' && rm -rf 'android/app/src/main/res/raw/*' && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.release-android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf 'android/app/src/main/res/drawable-*' && rm -rf 'android/app/src/main/res/raw/*' && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.bundle-android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf 'android/app/src/main/res/drawable-*' && rm -rf 'android/app/src/main/res/raw/*' && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
